message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
You're being too generous, let's try for more!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're getting closer, but I want more!
Getting closer to my target, Bob!
You're getting desperate, now's the time to give in!
I'm not giving in yet, Bob!
You're really lowballing me now, Alice. Time to get serious!

This is my final offer, Alice. Let's split it down the middle and walk away with something.
